projects.title: Projects that make an impact
projects.subtitle: Explore my recent work across web development and blockchain technologies, focused on performance and user experience.

items.title: Creator's Brain
items.description: An AI-powered SaaS platform for YouTube creators to analyze, optimize, and grow their content using advanced AI tools and insights.

caseStudy.problem: YouTube creators often struggle with poor-performing videos, low engagement, and creative fatigue due to manual scripting, thumbnail design, and title optimization.
caseStudy.solution: Built an AI-first SaaS product that reverse-engineers successful video strategies by using Claude 3.7 for intelligent content suggestions, YouTube API for real-time data, and Vercel AI SDK for interactive AI chat capabilities. Transcripts, thumbnails, and video reports are auto-generated to streamline content workflows.
caseStudy.impact: Early testers report a 30% increase in video engagement and a 20% boost in subscriber growth.

items.title: Collaborix
items.description: A real-time collaboration platform for remote teams, integrating AI-powered workflows and rich-text editing

caseStudy.problem: Remote teams faced inefficiencies due to fragmented tools, leading to communication breakdowns, delayed project timelines, and reduced productivity across distributed work environments.
caseStudy.solution: Developed a unified platform with real-time document editing, AI-driven workflow automation, and seamless user management using Next.js, Clerk for authentication, Cloudflare Workers for scalability, Firestore for real-time data, and Liveblocks for collaborative features.
caseStudy.impact: Boosted team productivity by 40% and reduced project completion time by 25% for over 50 enterprise clients, as measured by user feedback and performance analytics.

items.title: MotionUI
items.description: Performance-optimized design system built for Next.js applications

caseStudy.problem: Developers were struggling with performance issues when implementing complex UI components in Next.js applications.
caseStudy.solution: Created a lightweight, tree-shakable component library optimized specifically for Next.js with built-in performance monitoring.
caseStudy.impact: Reduced average page load times by 35% and decreased bundle sizes by 42% across client applications.

experience.title: Experience & Skills
experience.subtitle: My professional journey and technical expertise in web development and blockchain technologies.

roles.description: Working on full product cycles — from designing frontend flows to connecting backend systems and deploying them to production.
achievements: Built and maintained production-ready dashboards for B2B clients using Next.js and PostgreSQL
Set up scalable authentication with Clerk and optimized secure login flows
Improved performance across 2 apps with dynamic routing and server-side rendering
Led QA testing efforts and implemented performance monitoring with Sentry and Vercel

roles.description: Expanded my skillset from frontend to full-stack by taking ownership of minor backend services, debugging, and integrations.
achievements: Built and deployed internal tools using Node.js, Express, and Firebase
Integrated RESTful APIs with dynamic dashboard interfaces
Assisted in implementing role-based authentication using JWT and Clerk
Participated in sprint planning and contributed to internal DevOps automation scripts

roles.description: Led frontend implementation across multiple client-facing projects, focusing on consistent UI systems and delivery quality.
achievements: Redesigned 4 legacy interfaces using Next.js and Tailwind CSS to modern standards
Created a component-based UI library adopted across 3 teams to speed up development
Collaborated with design and backend teams to ensure pixel-perfect implementation
Mentored 2 junior developers and conducted weekly UI code reviews

roles.description: Led the frontend development of a Web3 NFT marketplace, ensuring responsive performance and seamless wallet interactions.
achievements: Built and launched the MVP with a fully custom UI and reusable design system
Integrated Web3 wallet functionality using ethers.js, improving user onboarding
Reduced page load time by 40% using code splitting and image optimization
Managed team planning, code reviews, and coordination with smart contract developers
